genericContent.itemName: Vizio 42" Class  LCD 1080p 60Hz HDTV , E421VO, RCA  Home Theater System, 6ft HDMI Cable, TV Bundle
genericContent.shortDescription: The VIZIO E421VO HDTV is a 42-inch LCD TV that delivers full-HD picture. Equipped with a 100,000:1 contrast ratio, the clear picture HDTV resolves the brightest white, darkest black and all the shades in between with excellent accuracy. With 178 degree vertical and horizontal wide viewing angles, you can view a clear picture from anywhere in the room. It features a refresh rate of 60Hz that reproduces live action like sports broadcasts in stunning detail. The Vizio 42" class LCD 1080p 60Hz HDTV also boasts of ambient light-sensing technology that synchronizes the backlight according to the room's brightness. This allows for a fatigue free viewing experience even during long sessions. The LCD HDTV can effortlessly render videos up to full HD 1920 X 1080 resolution. It comes with a robust 5 ms response time which facilitates robust console gaming. Overall, if you are looking for a sleek TV that delivers crystal-clear picture quality, the E421VO is a smart choice.
genericContent.longDescription:
VIZIO E421VO HDTV:
  • 16:9 LCD panel
  • With 1920 x 1080 full-HD resolution
  • Wide 178-degree vertical and 178-degree horizontal angles
  • See a clear picture from anywhere in the room on the VIZIO 42" 1080p LCD HDTV
  • Built-in ATSC digital/NTSC analog tuner
  • Receive digital broadcasts including HDTV programs, where available
  • High brightness of 500 cd/m2
  • Place your TV anywhere
  • 100,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio and with 8-ms. response
  • Ensures bright whites, rich blacks, vivid colors and less blurring during on-screen motion
genericContent.shelfDescription: <li>42.02" diagonal screen size<li>HDMI inputs: 2<li>Wall mountable with detachable base stand<li>SRS TruVolume and SRS TruSurroundHD
